city.council.dialog.idcard.renew.end2: Please take this ID card with you. Goodbye.

city.council.dialog.idcard.renew.raw.2: I'll hold on to that. Have a nice day.
city.council.dialog.idcard.renew.wrongit: That is not an ID card.
Please place an ID card on the counter!
